attributes.additional_details:
http://www.votesat16.org/about/ - For ( The movement already has lots of backing, it just needs a little more of a push, to achieve the results we require)

https://www.rt.com/uk/322894-teen-vote-eu-referendum/ - Against (In this article Lord Faulks claims the reason to not allow 16 year olds to vote is because they are too immature, and the brain stops developing at 25 years old. Yet 16 year olds are allowed to join the armed forces amongst other monumental decisions and 18 year olds are allowed to vote regardless)
attributes.background: 1.5 million young people in the UK are denied a political voice. In light of the EU referendum and the idea the already widening gap between generational views. The fact that 16 and 17 year olds are not able to vote in decisions directly affecting them is undemocratic. Let them vote for their future
